modules.description: This module sends HTTP/1.1 requests over an established connection and handles responses asynchronously. It works with socket connections, HTTP request and response structures, and streaming request bodies. Concrete use cases include making API calls, uploading data to web services, and interacting with HTTP servers using custom networking logic.

Handles incoming HTTP connections asynchronously. It creates a connection handler that processes requests and errors using provided callbacks, working with socket addresses and asynchronous sockets. Useful for building HTTP servers that handle multiple requests concurrently.

This module enables asynchronous HTTP communication by managing both client requests and server responses over sockets. It supports key operations like sending HTTP/1.1 requests with streaming bodies and handling incoming connections with callback-driven request processing. Core data types include HTTP requests and responses, socket addresses, and asynchronous connection handlers. You can use it to build concurrent HTTP servers or make API calls with custom networking logic.
